spec_data.Name: perl-Digest-PBKDF2
spec_data.Description:
A minimalist Digest module using the PBKDF2 algorithm.  You can only use one
salt, a pre-salt, with this module. It is not smart enough to do post-salts.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:07:55 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Digest module using the PBKDF2 algorithm
